div.p:
Published by Hans Liefrinck, In the year of Christ 1556.
Various kinds of partitions, or (as it pleases the Italians) forms of compartments, now fresh, invented for the favor of painters, statuary, sculptors, goldsmiths, architects, and other such craftsmen.
For sale in Antwerp, Lombardenvest, at the sign of the Turk's Head.
